# Tokenomics — $MESH Token

$MESH is the native, deflationary utility & governance token that powers the FASTGRok MESH network.

| Parameter                | Value                              |
|--------------------------|------------------------------------|
| **Token Name**           | MESH                               |
| **Total Supply**         | 21,000,000,000 (fixed, Bitcoin-style) |
| **Consensus**            | Proof-of-Storage + Proof-of-Bandwidth |
| **Block Time**           | ~15 seconds                        |
| **Emission**             | 4-year halving schedule            |
| **Initial Block Reward** | 1,300,000 $MESH                    |
| **Halvings**             | 2030, 2034, 2038 …                 |
| **Burn Mechanism**       | 5–50 $MESH burned per priority video generation |

### Distribution (Fair Launch)

| Allocation              | Percentage | Amount           | Vesting / Unlock                     |
|-------------------------|------------|------------------|--------------------------------------|
| Mining (Storage + BW)   | 50%        | 10.5 B           | Earned over decades via proofs       |
| xAI Treasury            | 20%        | 4.2 B            | 4-year linear vest                   |
| ISP Partners            | 15%        | 3.15 B           | 3-year cliff + linear                |
| Community & Airdrop     | 10%        | 2.1 B            | Quarterly drops to node operators    |
| Team & Advisors         | 5%         | 1.05 B           | 4-year vest + 1-year cliff           |

### Daily Rewards (2028 estimates at $0.015/token)

| Node Type               | Storage | Approx. Daily $MESH | Yearly USD |
|-------------------------|---------|---------------------|------------|
| ISP Router (4 GB)       | 4 GB    | 8–15                | $45–$80    |
| Recycled Phone (128 GB) | 128 GB  | 80–180              | $450–$1k   |
| Enthusiast (10 TB)      | 10 TB   | 8,000–15,000        | $45k–$80k  |

> Deflationary pressure: Every paid video generation permanently burns $MESH → long-term value accrual to honest storage providers.
